name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes
longDescription: A rich and flavorful North Indian dish made with cottage cheese simmered in a buttery tomato gravy, finished with aromatic spices.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken in spiced tomato cream sauce
longDescription: Tender chicken pieces marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled and served in a creamy tomato sauce.

name: Lamb Rogan Josh
description: Slow-cooked lamb in aromatic Kashmiri gravy
longDescription: Classic Kashmiri dish with tender lamb pieces cooked in a blend of spices and yogurt, finished with saffron.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy rice crepe stuffed with spiced potatoes
longDescription: South Indian delicacy made with fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a savory potato mixture and served with chutneys.

name: Dal Makhani
description: Slow-cooked black lentils in creamy sauce
longDescription: Rich and creamy lentil dish made with whole black lentils and kidney beans, simmered overnight with spices and butter.

name: Goan Fish Curry
description: Tangy coconut fish curry from Goa
longDescription: Fresh fish cooked in a tangy and spicy coconut-based gravy, flavored with tamarind and Goan spices.

name: Aloo Gobi
longDescription: Classic vegetarian dish with potatoes and cauliflower cooked with tomatoes, ginger, and spices.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice with marinated meat
longDescription: Aromatic rice dish cooked with marinated chicken or lamb, saffron, and spices, layered and slow-cooked to perfection.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpea curry with fluffy fried bread
longDescription: North Indian favorite featuring spicy chickpeas served with deep-fried, soft and fluffy bread.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft milk dumplings in rose syrup
longDescription: Popular Indian dessert made from milk solids, deep-fried and soaked in fragrant rose-flavored sugar syrup.
